save

ModuleInstanceTemplateDTO save(String portalId,
                               ModuleInstanceDTO dto)
                               throws PMSException
Saves a connector. If the ID is null the operation is considered an insertion. Otherwise, it is considered an update.

Parameters:
portalId - Portal Id.
dto - Object to save.
Returns:
The saved object.
Throws:
ComponentNotFoundException - if the component module instance is not found.
PMSException

delete

void delete(String portalId,
            String id)
            throws PMSException
Deletes a component package.

Parameters:
portalId - Portal Id.
id - Id of the component package.
Throws:
ComponentNotFoundException - if the component module instance is not found.
ComponentInUseException - if the component module instance is in use.
PMSException
